products.name: Signature Sourdough
products.description: As a naturally leavened bread, no commercial yeast was used for the rising process. It has a chewy texture and this soury taste that you will get addicted to. It allows you to put on any spreads or toppings to customize it to your own appetite.

products.name: Cinnamon Roll (4 in a Pack)
products.description: Made with a rich dough leavened with yeast, our cinnamon roll is a sweet baked dough covered with cinnamon-sugar filling, and topped with our secret frosting.

products.name: Signature Croissant
products.description: Our signature handmade puffy bread containing a flaky, crispy texture with a hint of sweetness without the use of any toppings or fillings.

products.name: Plain Doughnut (3 in a Pack)
products.description: A small fried snack that is crispy on the outside yet maintaining a soft inner texture. Icing sugar is sprinkled upon to provide the right amount of sweetness you need.

products.name: Blueberry Muffin
products.description: A batter-based bakery good that offers a similar taste of a bread and cake mixture, filled with our premium homemade blueberry jam.

products.name: Semla
products.description: A cardamom-spiced wheat bun originated from Sweden, filled with a mixture of milk and almond paste, and topped with fluffy whipped cream

products.name: Macarons (6 in a Pack)
products.description: Sweet meringue-based sandwich cookie that comes in six different flavours: Cofee, Nutella, Passion Fruit, Earl Grey, Mango and Vanilla.

products.name: Scone
products.description: A buttery bread glazed with egg wash offers a hint of sweet tanginess with a savoury taste originated from our premium homemade strawberry jam, topped with icing sugar that are only sprinkled upon customers' orders.

products.name: Almond Croissant
products.description: Our signature puffy, flaky bread with a nutty sweetness from the fragrance of the fresh almond cream and topped with chopped almonds

products.name: Sourdough Pretzel
products.description: A chewy yet crunchy sourdough made into the shape of a knot, offering a mixture of soury and salty taste along with sesame seeds toppings that enhance the bread's texture

products.name: Apple Tart
products.description: A small tart filled with fresh apple slices covered with a fair amount brown sugar and cinnamon that guarantees a balance between the sweet and tart flavor.

products.name: Banana Nut Bread
products.description: A cake-like moist, sweet bread made of fresh mashed bananas filled with chopped nuts and sprinkled with chocolate chips.
